DataLayer.Source: SELECT P.Fld_Field_21 AS BUSINESS_UNIT, P.Fld_Field_4 AS LEASE_NUMBER, P.Fld_Field_30 AS UNIT_NUMBER , P.Fld_Field_34 AS DBA_NAME, IFNULL(hdr.SECTION_NAME,'') AS SECTION_NAME, IFNULL(dtl.Field_Description,'') AS FIELD_NAME, IFNULL(ML.Description,'') AS PICKLIST_VALUE, AD.`document_filename` AS DOCUMENT_NAME, AD.`pageIndex` AS PAGE_NUMBER, Fld_FKey_Field_4 AS DOCUMENT_REFERENCE, AD.`note` AS ANNOTATION_NOTE FROM `annotation_details` AD LEFT JOIN `v_xl_tbl_section_1` P ON P.Pkey = AD.Leasekey LEFT JOIN `tbl_section_hdr` hdr ON hdr.Pkey = AD.`SectionName` LEFT JOIN `tbl_section_dtl` dtl ON dtl.Pkey = AD.`FieldName` LEFT JOIN `masterlist` ML ON ML.pkey = AD.`PicklistValue` LEFT JOIN `v_xl_tbl_section_16` DC ON DC.pkey = AD.`RecordKey` WHERE IFNULL(hdr.SECTION_NAME,'') <>'' AND IFNULL(dtl.Field_Description,'') <>'' ORDER BY AD.pkey DESC

SELECT P.Fld_Field_21 AS BUSINESS_UNIT, P.Fld_Field_4 AS LEASE_NUMBER, P.Fld_Field_30 AS UNIT_NUMBER , P.Fld_Field_34 AS DBA_NAME, IFNULL(hdr.SECTION_NAME,'') AS SECTION_NAME, IFNULL(dtl.Field_Description,'') AS FIELD_NAME, IFNULL(ML.Description,'') AS PICKLIST_VALUE, AD.`document_filename` AS DOCUMENT_NAME, AD.`pageIndex` AS PAGE_NUMBER, Fld_FKey_Field_4 AS DOCUMENT_REFERENCE, AD.`note` AS ANNOTATION_NOTE FROM `annotation_details` AD LEFT JOIN `v_xl_tbl_section_1` P ON P.Pkey = AD.Leasekey LEFT JOIN `tbl_section_hdr` hdr ON hdr.Pkey = AD.`SectionName` LEFT JOIN `tbl_section_dtl` dtl ON dtl.Pkey = AD.`FieldName` LEFT JOIN `masterlist` ML ON ML.pkey = AD.`PicklistValue` LEFT JOIN `v_xl_tbl_section_16` DC ON DC.pkey = AD.`RecordKey` WHERE IFNULL(hdr.SECTION_NAME,'') <>'' AND IFNULL(dtl.Field_Description,'') <>'' ORDER BY AD.pkey DESC

StaticDataRow.ColumnFriendlyNames: Business Unit, Lease Number, Unit Number, DBA Name, Section Name, Field Name, Picklist Value, Document Name, Page Number, Document Reference, Annotation Note
